anya-e0103n0:25_0: 1. Svāyaṁ visuddhimaggo yaṁ suttapadaṁ nissāya paṭṭhapīyati, taṁ tāva nikkhipitvā
anya-e0103n0:25_1: tassa nidānādiniddhāraṇamukhena nānappakārato atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇetuṁ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādi
anya-e0103n0:25_2: āraddhaṁ. Dhammaṁ saṁvaṇṇentena hi ādito tassa nidānaṁ vattabbaṁ, tato payojanaṁ
anya-e0103n0:25_3: piṇḍattho padattho sambandho adhippāyo codanā sodhanaṁ vattabbaṁ. Tathā ceva ācariyena
anya-e0103n0:25_4: paṭipannaṁ. Ettha hi bhagavantaṁ kirātiādi desanāya nidānapayojananiddhāraṇaṁ, visuddhimaggaṁ
anya-e0103n0:25_6: kiṁ sīlantiādi codanā, tato paraṁ sodhanaṁ, samādhipaññākathāsupi eseva nayo. Kasmā
anya-e0103n0:25_7: panettha vissajjanagāthā ādimhi nikkhittā, na pucchāgāthā. Pucchāpubbikā hi vissajjanāti?
anya-e0103n0:25_8: Vuccate – tadatthassa maṅgalabhāvato, sāsanassa ādikalyāṇādibhāvavibhāvanato, bhayādiupaddavanivāraṇena
anya-e0103n0:26_0: Etthāha – kasmā panāyaṁ visuddhimaggakathā vatthupubbikā āraddhā, na satthuthomanāpubbikāti?
anya-e0103n0:26_1: Vuccate – visuṁ asaṁvaṇṇanādibhāvato. Sumaṅgalavilāsinīādayo viya hi dīghanikāyādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n0:26_2: nāyaṁ visuṁ saṁvaṇṇanā, na pakaraṇantaraṁ vā abhidhammāvatārasumatāvatārādi viya.
anya-e0103n0:26_3: Tāsaṁyeva pana sumaṅgalavilāsinīādīnaṁ visesabhūtā. Tenevāha “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:26_4: Atha vā thomanāpubbikāpi cāyaṁ kathā na vatthupubbikāvāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Sāsane hi vatthukittanaṁ
anya-e0103n0:26_5: na loke viya kevalaṁ hoti, sāsanasampattikittanattā pana satthu aviparītadhammadesanābhāvavibhāvanena
anya-e0103n0:26_6: satthuguṇasaṁkittanaṁ ulliṅgantameva pavattati. Tathā hi vakkhati “ettāvatā tisso
anya-e0103n0:26_7: sikkhā”tiādi. Sotāpannādibhāvassa ca kāraṇanti ettha hi ādi-saddena sabbasakadāgāmianāgāmino
anya-e0103n0:26_8: viya sabbepi arahanto saṅgayhanti vibhāgassa anuddhaṭattā. Tena tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:26_9: nibbedhabhāgiyā sīlādayo idha “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādivacanena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:26_10: Tiṇṇampi hi nesaṁ carimabhave visesato saṁsārabhayikkhaṇaṁ, yathāsakaṁ sīle patiṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n0:26_11: samathavipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanapaṭipatti ca samānāti. Atha vā “so
anya-e0103n0:26_12: imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti sādhāraṇavacanena sātisayaṁ, niratisayañca taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanaṁ
anya-e0103n0:26_13: gahitaṁ. Tattha yaṁ niratisayaṁ savāsanappahānatāya. Tena satthu pahānasampadā kittitā
anya-e0103n0:26_14: hoti, tannimittā ñāṇasampadā ca. Tadubhayena nānantarikatāya ānubhāvasampadādayopīti.
anya-e0103n0:26_15: Evampi thomanāpubbikāyaṁ kathāti veditabbaṁ. Atha vā thomanāpubbikā evāyaṁ kathāti
anya-e0103n0:26_17: saṁvaṇṇanāya āraddhattā. Sā panāyaṁ yasmā pucchantassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṁ byākaraṇasamatthatāya
anya-e0103n0:26_18: vibhāvanavasena pavattitā, āciṇṇañcetaṁ ācariyassa yadidaṁ saṁvaṇṇetabbadhammānukūlaṁ
anya-e0103n0:26_19: saṁvaṇṇanārambhe satthu abhitthavanaṁ. Tasmā iminā kāraṇena evamettha thomanā pavattitāti.
anya-e0103n0:26_20: Thomanākārassa vuccamānassa kāraṇaṁ uddharantena paṭhamaṁ vissajjanagāthaṁ nikkhipitvā
anya-e0103n0:26_21: tassā nidānacodanāmukhena pucchāgāthaṁ sarūpato ca atthato ca dassetvā tassā pucchāya
anya-e0103n0:26_23: katā. Tenāha “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādi. Tattha gāthāya attho parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n0:27_1: Tathā hesa “ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccatī”tiādīsu hetumhi āgato.
anya-e0103n0:27_2: “Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu
anya-e0103n0:27_3: anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ, no āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu parisamāpane.
anya-e0103n0:27_4: “Iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe. “Māgaṇḍiyoti
anya-e0103n0:27_5: tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṁ nāmakammaṁ nāmadheyyaṁ nirutti
anya-e0103n0:27_6: byañjanaṁ abhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye. “Iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo
anya-e0103n0:27_7: bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito. Saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito. Saupasaggo bālo,
anya-e0103n0:27_8: anupasaggo paṇḍito”tiādīsu pakāre. “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena
anya-e0103n0:27_9: satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṁ, kiṁpaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā
anya-e0103n0:27_10: jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya”ntiādīsu avadhāraṇe, sanniṭṭhāneti attho. “Atthīti
anya-e0103n0:27_11: kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, natthīti kho, kaccāna, ayaṁ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu nidassane.
anya-e0103n0:27_12: Idhāpi nidassane daṭṭhabbo, pakāretipi vattuṁ vaṭṭateva. Paṭhamo pana iti-saddo parisamāpane
anya-e0103n0:27_13: daṭṭhabbo. Hīti avadhāraṇe. Idanti āsannapaccakkhavacanaṁ yathādhigatassa suttapadassa abhimukhīkaraṇato.
anya-e0103n0:28: Vuttanti ayaṁ vutta-saddo saupasaggo, anupasaggo ca vappanavāpasamīkaraṇakesohāraṇajīvitavuttipamuttabhāvapāvacanapavattitaajjhesanakathanādīsu dissati. Tathā hi ayaṁ –
anya-e0103n0:30: Vuttānaṁ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṁ na dubbhatī”ti. –
anya-e0103n0:31_0: Ādīsu vappane āgato. “No ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu aṭṭhadantakādīhi vāpasamīkaraṇe.
anya-e0103n0:31_1: “Kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu kesohāraṇe. “Pannalomo paradattavutto migabhūtena
anya-e0103n0:31_2: cetasā viharatī”tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṁ. “Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto
anya-e0103n0:31_3: abhabbo haritatthāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve. “Yesamidaṁ etarahi porāṇaṁ
anya-e0103n0:31_4: mantapadaṁ gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samihita”ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. Loke pana
anya-e0103n0:31_5: “vutto guṇo vutto pārāyano”tiādīsu ajjhesane. “Vuttaṁ kho panetaṁ bhagavatā ‘dhammadāyādā
anya-e0103n0:31_6: me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā’ti”ādīsu kathane. Idhāpi kathane eva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:31_7: Tasmā “iti hi evameva idaṁ suttaṁ desita”nti yathānikkhittaṁ gāthaṁ desitabhāvena
anya-e0103n0:32_0: Kasmāti hetumhi nissakkaṁ. Panāti vacanālaṅkāramattaṁ. Ubhayenāpi kāraṇaṁ pucchati.
anya-e0103n0:32_1: Etanti yathāvuttaṁ suttapadaṁ paccāmasati. Vuttanti pucchānimittaṁ. Tadatthassa attano
anya-e0103n0:32_2: buddhiyaṁ viparivattamānataṁ upādāya “ida”nti vatvā puna bhagavatā bhāsitākāraṁ sandhāya
anya-e0103n0:32_3: “eta”nti vuttaṁ. Sakalena panānena vacanena desanāya nidānaṁ jotitaṁ hoti. Parato
anya-e0103n0:32_4: tassā desakadesakālapaṭiggāhake vibhāvetuṁ “bhagavantaṁ kirā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n0:32_5: kirāti anussavanatthe nipāto. Tena vuccamānassatthassa anu anu suyyamānataṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0103n0:32_6: Rattibhāgeti rattiyā ekasmiṁ koṭṭhāse, majjhimayāmeti adhippāyo. Vessavaṇādayo viya
anya-e0103n0:32_7: apākaṭanāmadheyyattā aññataro. Devo eva devaputto. Saṁsayasamugghāṭatthanti vicikicchāsallasamuddharaṇatthaṁ
anya-e0103n0:32_8: pucchīti yojanā. “Saṁsayasamugghāṭattha”nti ca iminā pañcasu pucchāsu ayaṁ vimaticchedanāpucchāti
anya-e0103n0:32_9: dasseti. Yena atthena taṇhā “jaṭā”ti vuttā, tameva atthaṁ dassetuṁ “jāliniyā”tiādi
anya-e0103n0:32_10: vuttaṁ. Sā hi aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedo attano avayavabhūto eva jālo etissā
anya-e0103n0:33_0: Idānissā jaṭākārena pavattiṁ dassetuṁ “sā hī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha rūpādīsu ārammaṇesūti
anya-e0103n0:33_2: Heṭṭhupariyavasenāti kadāci rūpārammaṇe kadāci yāva dhammārammaṇe kadāci dhammārammaṇe
anya-e0103n0:33_3: kadāci yāva rūpārammaṇeti evaṁ heṭṭhā, upari ca pavattivasena. Desanākkamena cettha
anya-e0103n0:33_4: heṭṭhupariyatā daṭṭhabbā. Kadāci kāmabhave kadāci rūpabhave kadāci arūpabhave kadāci
anya-e0103n0:33_5: vā arūpabhave…pe… kadāci kāmabhaveti evamettha heṭṭhupariyavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:33_6: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvattā aparāparuppatti ettha saṁsibbananti
anya-e0103n0:33_7: āha “punappunaṁ uppajjanato”ti. “Saṁsibbanaṭṭhenā”ti idaṁ yena sambandhena jaṭā viyāti
anya-e0103n0:33_8: jaṭāti jaṭātaṇhānaṁ upamūpameyyatā, taṁdassanaṁ. Ayaṁ hettha attho – yathā jālino
anya-e0103n0:33_9: veḷugumbassa sākhā, kosasañcayādayo ca attanā attano avayavehi saṁsibbitā vinaddhā
anya-e0103n0:33_10: “jaṭā”ti vuccanti, evaṁ taṇhāpi saṁsibbanasabhāvenāti, “saṁsibbitaṭṭhenā”ti vā pāṭho,
anya-e0103n0:33_11: attanāva attano saṁsibbitabhāvenāti attho. Ayaṁ hi taṇhā kosakārakimi viya attanāva
anya-e0103n0:33_12: attānampi saṁsibbantī pavattati. Tenāha bhagavā “rūpataṇhā loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ,
anya-e0103n0:33_13: etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisatī”tiādi. Ime sattā “mama
anya-e0103n0:33_14: ida”nti pariggahitaṁ vatthuṁ attanibbisesaṁ maññamānā abbhantarimaṁ karonti. Abbhantarattho
anya-e0103n0:33_15: ca antosaddoti sakaparikkhāre uppajjamānāpi taṇhā “antojaṭā”ti vuttā. Pabbajitassa
anya-e0103n0:34_0: “Attā”ti bhavati ettha abhimānoti attabhāvo, upādānakkhandhapañcakaṁ. Sarīranti keci.
anya-e0103n0:34_1: Mama attabhāvo sundaro, asukassa viya mama attabhāvo bhaveyyāti vā ādinā sakaattabhāvādīsu
anya-e0103n0:34_2: taṇhāya uppajjamānākāro veditabbo. Attano cakkhādīni ajjhattikāyatanāni. Attano,
anya-e0103n0:34_3: paresañca rūpādīni bāhirāyatanāni. Paresaṁ sabbāni vā, saparasantatipariyāpannāni
anya-e0103n0:34_4: vā cakkhādīni ajjhattikāyatanāni. Tathā rūpādīni bāhirāyatanāni. Parittamahaggatabhavesu
anya-e0103n0:34_5: pavattiyāpi taṇhāya antojaṭābahijaṭābhāvo veditabbo. Kāmabhavo hi kassacipi kilesassa
anya-e0103n0:34_7: anto”ti ca vuccati. Tabbipariyāyato rūpārūpabhavo “bahiddhā, bahī”ti ca. Tenāha bhagavā
anya-e0103n0:34_9: ca anekabhedabhinnampi taṇhaṁ jaṭābhāvasāmaññena ekanti gahetvā “tāya evaṁ uppajjamānāya
anya-e0103n0:34_10: jaṭāyā”ti vuttaṁ. Sā pana “pajā”ti vuttasattasantānapariyāpannā eva hutvā punappunaṁ
anya-e0103n0:34_11: taṁ jaṭentī vinandhantī pavattatīti āha “jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā”ti. Tathā hi paramatthato
anya-e0103n0:34_12: yadipi avayavabyatirekena samudāyo natthi, ekadeso pana samudāyo nāma na hotīti avayavato
anya-e0103n0:34_13: samudāyaṁ bhinnaṁ katvā upamūpameyyaṁ dassento “yathā nāmaveḷujaṭādīhi…pe… saṁsibbitā”ti
anya-e0103n0:34_14: āha. Imaṁ jaṭanti sambandho. Tīsu dhātūsu ekampi asesetvā saṁsibbanena tedhātukaṁ
anya-e0103n0:34_15: jaṭetvā ṭhitaṁ. Tenassā mahāvisayataṁ, vijaṭanassa ca sudukkarabhāvamāha. “Vijaṭetuṁ
anya-e0103n0:34_16: ko samattho”ti iminā “vijaṭaye”ti padaṁ sattiatthaṁ, na vidhiādiatthanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:35_0: Evaṁ “antojaṭā”tiādinā puṭṭho pana assa devaputtassa imaṁ gāthamāhāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:35_1: “Edisova imaṁ pañhaṁ vissajjeyyā”ti satthāraṁ guṇato dassento “sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:35_2: Tattha sabbadhammesūti atītādibhedabhinnesu sabbesu ñeyyadhammesu. Appaṭihatañāṇacāroti
anya-e0103n0:35_3: anavasesañeyyāvaraṇappahānena nissaṅgacārattā navihatañāṇapavattiko. Etena tīsu kālesu
anya-e0103n0:35_4: appaṭihatañāṇatāvibhāvanena ādito tiṇṇaṁ āveṇikadhammānaṁ gahaṇeneva tadekalakkhaṇatāya
anya-e0103n0:35_5: tadavinābhāvato ca bhagavato sesāveṇikadhammānampi gahitabhāvo veditabbo. Dibbanti
anya-e0103n0:35_6: kāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti laḷanti, tesu vā viharanti, vijayasamatthatāyogena paccatthike
anya-e0103n0:35_8: voharanti, puññātisayayogānubhāvappattāya jutiyā jotanti, yathādhippetañca visayaṁ
anya-e0103n0:35_9: appaṭighātena gacchanti, yathicchitanipphādane ca sakkontīti devā. Atha vā devanīyā
anya-e0103n0:35_10: taṁtaṁbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṁ parāyaṇanti gamanīyā, abhitthavanīyā vā,
anya-e0103n0:35_11: sobhāvisesayogena kamanīyāti vā devā. Te tividhā – sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti.
anya-e0103n0:35_12: Bhagavā pana niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānagatapañcavidhamāravijayicchānipphattiyā
anya-e0103n0:35_16: appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti gamanīyato,
anya-e0103n0:35_17: abhitthavanīyato, bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya
anya-e0103n0:35_18: ṭhitattā tesaṁ devānaṁ seṭṭho uttamo devoti devadevo. Sabbadevehi pūjanīyataro devoti
anya-e0103n0:35_19: vā, visuddhidevabhāvassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa vā adhigatattā aññesaṁ devānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:36_0: Aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sakkānaṁ, mahābrahmānañca guṇābhibhavanato adhiko
anya-e0103n0:36_1: atisayo atirekataro vā sakko brahmā cāti sakkānaṁ atisakko brahmānaṁ atibrahmā. Ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesesu
anya-e0103n0:36_2: sadevake loke kenaci avikkhambhanīyaṭṭhānatāya kutocipi utrastābhāvato catūhi vesārajjehi
anya-e0103n0:36_3: visāradoti catuvesārajjavisārado. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato
anya-e0103n0:36_4: ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti tatra vata maṁ samaṇo vā…pe… vesārajjappatto viharāmī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:36_5: Ṭhānāṭhānañāṇādīhi dasahi ñāṇabalehi samannāgatattā dasabaladharo. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ
anya-e0103n0:36_6: “idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato, aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:36_7: Yaṁ kiñci ñeyyaṁ nāma, tattha sabbattheva anāvaṭañāṇatāya anāvaraṇañāṇo. Tañca sabbaṁ
anya-e0103n0:36_8: samantato sabbākārato hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya paccakkhato dassanasamatthena ñāṇacakkhunā
anya-e0103n0:36_9: samannāgatattā samantacakkhu, sabbaññūti attho. Imehi pana dvīhi padehi pacchimāni
anya-e0103n0:36_10: dve asādhāraṇañāṇāni gahitāni. Bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā. Yaṁ panettha vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n0:37_0: Ettha ca “sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro”ti iminā tiyaddhāruḷhānaṁ pucchānaṁ bhagavato
anya-e0103n0:37_1: byākaraṇasamatthatāya dassitāya kiṁ devatānampi pucchaṁ byākātuṁ samattho bhagavāti
anya-e0103n0:37_2: āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṁ “devadevo”ti vuttaṁ. Devānaṁ atidevo sakko devānamindo
anya-e0103n0:37_3: devatānaṁ pañhaṁ vissajjeti, “tato imassa ko viseso”ti cintentānaṁ tannivattanatthaṁ
anya-e0103n0:37_4: “sakkānaṁ atisakko”ti vuttaṁ. Sakkenapi pucchitamatthaṁ sanaṅkumārādayo brahmāno
anya-e0103n0:37_5: vissajjenti, “tato imassa ko atisayo”ti cintentānaṁ tannivattanatthaṁ “brahmānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:37_6: atibrahmā”ti vuttaṁ. Ayaṁ cassa viseso catuvesārajjadasabalañāṇehi pākaṭo jātoti
anya-e0103n0:37_7: dassanatthaṁ “catu…pe… dharo”ti vuttaṁ. Imāni ca ñāṇāni imassa ñāṇadvayassa adhigamena
anya-e0103n0:37_8: saheva siddhānīti dassanatthaṁ “anāvaraṇañāṇo samantacakkhū”ti vuttaṁ. Tayidaṁ ñāṇadvayaṁ
anya-e0103n0:37_10: Evametesaṁ padānaṁ gahaṇe payojanaṁ, anupubbi ca veditabbā. Yaṁ panetaṁ pacchimaṁ
anya-e0103n0:37_11: anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇanti ñāṇadvayaṁ, taṁ atthato abhinnaṁ. Ekameva hi taṁ
anya-e0103n0:37_12: ñāṇaṁ visayapavattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṁ dvidhā katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:37_14: nissaṅgacāramupādāya “anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntipi vuttaṁ. Yaṁ panettha vattabbaṁ, taṁ parato
anya-e0103n0:38_0: 2. Mahante sīlakkhandhādike esī gavesīti mahesi, bhagavā. Tena mahesinā. Vaṇṇayantoti
anya-e0103n0:38_1: vivaranto vitthārento. Yathābhūtanti aviparītaṁ. Sīlādibhedananti sīlasamādhipaññādivibhāgaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:38_2: Sudullabhanti aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjitena navamena khaṇena laddhabbattā suṭṭhu dullabhaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:38_3: Sīlādisaṅgahanti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahaṁ. Ariyamaggo hi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito
anya-e0103n0:38_4: sappadesattā nagaraṁ viya rajjena, na tayo khandhā ariyamaggena nippadesattā. Vuttañhetaṁ
anya-e0103n0:38_5: “na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā; tīhi
anya-e0103n0:38_6: ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito”ti. Kilesacorehi
anya-e0103n0:38_8: ujuṁ. Sabbesaṁ saṁkilesadhammānaṁ māraṇavasena gamanato pavattanato, nibbānassa magganato,
anya-e0103n0:38_9: nibbānatthikehi maggitabbato ca maggaṁ. Visuddhiyāti nibbānāya, visuddhibhāvāya vā, arahattāyāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:39_0: Yathābhūtaṁ ajānantāti evaṁ sīlavisuddhiādivisuddhiparamparāya adhigantabbo evarūpo
anya-e0103n0:39_1: evaṁkiccako evamatthoti yāthāvato anavabujjhantā. Sakalasaṁkilesato, saṁsārato ca
anya-e0103n0:39_2: suddhiṁ vimuttiṁ kāmenti patthentīti suddhikāmā. Api-saddo sambhāvane. Tena na kevalaṁ
anya-e0103n0:39_3: sīlamattena parituṭṭhā, atha kho visuddhikāmāpi samānāti dasseti. Idhāti imasmiṁ
anya-e0103n0:39_4: sāsane. Bhāvanāya yuttapayuttatāya yogino vāyamantāpi visuddhiṁ uddissa payogaṁ parakkamaṁ
anya-e0103n0:39_5: karontāpi upāyassa anadhigatattā visuddhiṁ nādhigacchantīti yojanā. Tesanti yogīnaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:39_7: pāmojjakaro, yogīnaṁ pana sātisayaṁ pamodahetūti āha “tesaṁ pāmojjakaraṇa”nti. Bāhirakanikāyantaraladdhīhi
anya-e0103n0:39_9: attano apassayabhūtaṁ nikāyaṁ dasseti. Desanānayanissitanti dhammasaṁvaṇṇanānayasannissitaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:39_10: Ettha ca “tesaṁ pāmojjakaraṇa”ntiādinā sabbasaṁkilesamalavisuddhatāya visuddhiṁ nibbānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:39_11: patthentānaṁ yogīnaṁ ekaṁsena tadāvahattā pāmojjakaro ñāṇuttarehi sammāpaṭipannehi
anya-e0103n0:39_12: adhiṭṭhitattā suṭṭhu sammā visuddhavinicchayo mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ kathāmaggoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:39_13: Sakkaccaṁ me bhāsato sakkaccaṁ nisāmayathāti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:40_0: Ettha ca “imissā dāni gāthāyā”ti iminā visuddhimaggabhāsanassa nissayaṁ, “kathitāya
anya-e0103n0:40_1: mahesinā”ti iminā tassa pamāṇabhāvaṁ, “yathābhūtaṁ atthaṁ sīlādibhedana”nti iminā
anya-e0103n0:40_3: iminā payojanaṁ, “vaṇṇayanto atthaṁ, suvisuddhavinicchayaṁ mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ desanānayanissitaṁ,
anya-e0103n0:40_4: sakkacca”nti ca iminā karaṇappakāraṁ dassetvā “visuddhikāmā sabbepi, nisāmayatha
anya-e0103n0:40_5: sādhavo”ti iminā tattha sakkaccasavane sādhujane niyojeti. Sādhukaṁ savanapaṭibaddhā hi sāsanasampatti.
anya-e0103n0:41_1: abhiruciṁ uppādetīti padatthato visuddhimaggaṁ vibhāvetuṁ “tattha visuddhī”tiādi
anya-e0103n0:41_2: āraddhaṁ. Tattha tatthāti yadidaṁ “visuddhimaggaṁ bhāsissa”nti ettha visuddhimaggapadaṁ
anya-e0103n0:41_3: vuttaṁ, tattha. Sabbamalavirahitanti sabbehi rāgādimalehi, sabbehi saṁkilesamalehi
anya-e0103n0:41_4: ca virahitaṁ vivittaṁ. Tato eva accantaparisuddhaṁ, sabbadā sabbathā ca visuddhanti
anya-e0103n0:41_5: attho. Yathāvuttaṁ visuddhiṁ maggati gavesati adhigacchati etenāti visuddhimaggo.
anya-e0103n0:41_6: Tenāha “maggoti adhigamūpāyo vuccatī”ti. Visuddhimaggoti ca nippariyāyena lokuttaramaggo
anya-e0103n0:41_7: veditabbo, tadupāyattā pana pubbabhāgamaggo, tannissayo kathāpabandho ca tathā vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:42_0: Svāyaṁ visuddhimaggo satthārā desanāvilāsato, veneyyajjhāsayato ca nānānayehi desito,
anya-e0103n0:42_1: tesu ayameko nayo gahitoti dassetuṁ “so panāya”ntiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha katthacīti
anya-e0103n0:42_2: kismiñci sutte. Vipassanāmattavasenevāti avadhāraṇena samathaṁ nivatteti. So hi tassā
anya-e0103n0:42_3: paṭiyogī, na sīlādi. Matta-saddena ca visesanivattiatthena savisesaṁ samādhiṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0103n0:42_4: So upacārappanābhedo vipassanāyānikassa desanāti katvā na samādhimattaṁ. Na hi khaṇikasamādhiṁ
anya-e0103n0:42_5: vinā vipassanā sambhavati. Vipassanāti ca tividhāpi anupassanā veditabbā, na aniccānupassanāva.
anya-e0103n0:42_6: Na hi aniccadassanamattena saccābhisamayo sambhavati. Yaṁ pana gāthāyaṁ aniccalakkhaṇasseva
anya-e0103n0:42_7: gahaṇaṁ kataṁ, taṁ yassa tadeva suṭṭhutaraṁ pākaṭaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tādisassa vasena.
anya-e0103n0:42_8: Sopi hi itaraṁ lakkhaṇadvayaṁ vibhūtataraṁ katvā sammasitvā visesaṁ adhigacchati,
anya-e0103n0:43_0: Sabbe saṅkhārāti sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā, te hi sammasanīyā. Aniccāti na niccā addhuvā
anya-e0103n0:43_1: ittarā khaṇabhaṅgurāti. Paññāyāti vipassanāpaññāya. Passati sammasati. Atha pacchā
anya-e0103n0:43_2: udayabbayañāṇādīnaṁ uppattiyā uttarakālaṁ. Nibbindati dukkheti tasmiṁyeva aniccākārato
anya-e0103n0:43_3: diṭṭhe “sabbe saṅkhārā”ti vutte tebhūmake khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte dukkhe nibbindati
anya-e0103n0:43_4: nibbidāñāṇaṁ paṭilabhati. Esa maggo visuddhiyāti esa nibbidānupassanāsaṅkhāto virāgādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n0:44_0: Jhānapaññāvasenāti samathavipassanāvasena. Jhānanti cettha vipassanāya pādakabhūtaṁ
anya-e0103n0:44_1: jhānaṁ adhippetaṁ. Yamhīti yasmiṁ puggale. Jhānañca paññā cāti etthāyamattho – yo
anya-e0103n0:44_2: puggalo jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā taṁ ussukkāpeti. Sa ve nibbānasantiketi
anya-e0103n0:44_3: so byattaṁ nibbānassa samīpe ekantato nibbānaṁ adhigacchatīti.
anya-e0103n0:45_0: Kammanti maggacetanā. Sā hi apacayagāmitāya sattānaṁ suddhiṁ āvahati. Vijjāti sammādiṭṭhi.
anya-e0103n0:45_1: Sīlanti sammāvācākammantā. Jīvitamuttamanti sammāājīvo. Dhammoti avasesā cattāro
anya-e0103n0:45_2: ariyamaggadhammā. Atha vā kammanti sammākammantassa gahaṇaṁ. “Yā cāvuso visākha,
anya-e0103n0:45_3: sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti vacanato.
anya-e0103n0:45_4: Vijjāti sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappānaṁ gahaṇaṁ. Dhammoti samādhi “evaṁdhammā te bhagavanto
anya-e0103n0:45_5: ahesu”ntiādīsu viya. Taggahaṇeneva “yo cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati,
anya-e0103n0:45_6: yo ca sammāsamādhi, ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti vacanato sammāvāyāmasatīnampi
anya-e0103n0:45_7: gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Sīlanti sammāvācājīvānaṁ. Jīvitamuttamanti evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa
anya-e0103n0:45_8: jīvitaṁ uttamaṁ jīvitanti evamettha aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:46_0: Sīlādivasenāti sīlasamādhipaññāvīriyavasena. Sabbadāti samādānato pabhuti sabbakālaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:46_1: Sīlasampannoti catupārisuddhisīlasampadāya sampanno samannāgato. Paññavāti lokiyalokuttarāya
anya-e0103n0:46_2: paññāya samannāgato. Susamāhitoti taṁsampayuttena samādhinā suṭṭhu samāhito. Āraddhavīriyoti
anya-e0103n0:46_3: akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya paggahitavīriyo.
anya-e0103n0:46_4: Pahitattoti nibbānaṁ patipesitattatāya kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhacitto. Oghanti
anya-e0103n0:47_0: Ekāyanoti ekamaggo. Maggapariyāyo hi idha ayana-saddo, tasmā ekapathabhūto ayaṁ,
anya-e0103n0:47_1: bhikkhave, maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti attho. Ekaṁ vā nibbānaṁ ayati gacchatīti
anya-e0103n0:47_2: ekāyano, ekena vā gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṁ pahāya vivekaṭṭhena ayitabbo paṭipajjitabboti ekāyano,
anya-e0103n0:47_3: ayanti tenāti vā ayano, ekassa seṭṭhassa bhagavato ayanoti ekāyano, tena uppāditattā,
anya-e0103n0:47_4: ekasmiṁ vā imasmiṁyeva dhammavinaye ayanoti ekāyano. Sattānaṁ visuddhiyāti rāgādimalehi,
anya-e0103n0:47_5: abhijjhāvisamalobhādiupakkilesehi ca sattānaṁ visuddhatthāya visujjhanatthāya. Yadidanti
anya-e0103n0:47_6: nipāto, ye imeti attho. Pubbe saraṇalakkhaṇena maggaṭṭhena ca maggoti vuttasseva
anya-e0103n0:47_8: ettha ādi-saddena appamādābhiratiādīnaṁ saṅgaho veditabbo. Appamādābhiratiādivasenāpi
anya-e0103n0:50_0: 4.Tatrāti tassaṁ gāthāyaṁ. Upari vuccamānā gāthāya vitthārasaṁvaṇṇanā niddesapaṭiniddesaṭṭhāniyā,
anya-e0103n0:50_1: tato saṁkhittatarā atthavaṇṇanā uddesaṭṭhāniyāti āha “ayaṁ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā”ti. Yathāuddiṭṭhassa
anya-e0103n0:50_2: hi atthassa niddesapaṭiniddesā sukarā, subodhā ca hontīti. Sīle patiṭṭhāyāti ettha
anya-e0103n0:50_3: sīleti kusalasīle. Yadipi “katame ca, thapati, akusalā sīlā”tiādīsu akusalā dhammāpi
anya-e0103n0:50_4: sīlanti āgatā. Vuccamānāya pana cittapaññābhāvanāya adhiṭṭhānāyogyatāya kiriyasīlānampi
anya-e0103n0:50_5: asambhavo, kuto itaresanti kusalasīlamevettha adhippetaṁ. Sīlaṁ paripūrayamānotiādīsu
anya-e0103n0:50_6: paripūrayamānoti paripālento, parivaḍḍhento vā, sabbabhāgehi saṁvaranto, avītikkamanto
anya-e0103n0:50_7: cāti attho. Tathābhūto hi taṁ avijahanto tattha patiṭṭhito nāma hoti. “Sīle”ti hi
anya-e0103n0:50_8: idaṁ ādhāre bhummaṁ. Patiṭṭhāyāti duvidhā patiṭṭhā nissayūpanissayabhedato. Tattha
anya-e0103n0:50_9: upanissayapatiṭṭhā lokiyā, itarā lokuttarā abhinditvā gahaṇe. Bhinditvā pana gahaṇe
anya-e0103n0:50_10: yathā lokiyacittuppādesu sahajātānaṁ, purimapacchimānañca vasena nissayūpanissayapatiṭṭhā
anya-e0103n0:50_11: sambhavati, evaṁ lokuttaresu heṭṭhimamaggaphalasīlavasena upanissayapatiṭṭhāpi sambhavati.
anya-e0103n0:50_12: “Patiṭṭhāyā”ti ca padassa yadā upanissayapatiṭṭhā adhippetā, tadā “saddhaṁ upanissāyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n0:50_13: viya purimakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo. Tenāha “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ
anya-e0103n0:50_14: vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti. Yadā pana nissayapatiṭṭhā adhippetā, tadā
anya-e0103n0:50_15: “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādīsu viya samānakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo. Sammāvācādayo
anya-e0103n0:50_16: hi attanā sampayuttānaṁ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṁ sahajātavaseneva nissayapaccayā hontīti.
anya-e0103n0:51_0: Narati netīti naro, puriso. Yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto, itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n0:51_1: puri ucce ṭhāne seti pavattatīti “puriso”ti vuccati, evaṁ nayanaṭṭhena “naro”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:51_2: Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṁ netuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, pageva itaro
anya-e0103n0:51_3: itarāsaṁ. Narena yogato, narassa ayanti vā nārī, itthī. Sāpi cettha kāmaṁ taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanasamatthatā
anya-e0103n0:51_4: atthi, padhānameva pana sattaṁ dassento “naro”ti āha yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:51_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana avibhāgena puggalapariyāyo ayanti dassetuṁ “naroti satto”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:51_6: Sapaññoti vipākabhūtāya saha paññāya pavattatīti sapañño. Tāya hi ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n0:51_7: santānavasena bahulaṁ pavattamānāya ayaṁ satto savisesaṁ “sapañño”ti vattabbataṁ
anya-e0103n0:51_8: arahati. Vipākapaññāpi hi santānavisesanena bhāvanāpaññuppattiyā upanissayo hoti
anya-e0103n0:51_9: ahetukadvihetukānaṁ tadabhāvato. Sampajaññasaṅkhātāya ca taṁtaṁkiccakārikāya paññāya
anya-e0103n0:51_10: vasena “sapañño”ti vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana nipaka-saddena pārihārikapaññā
anya-e0103n0:51_12: kammajāya tihetukapaṭisandhiyaṁ paññāyāti evaṁ tihetuka-saddo paṭisandhi-saddena
anya-e0103n0:51_13: sambandhitabbo, na paññā-saddena. Na hi paññā tihetukā atthi. Paṭisandhito pabhuti
anya-e0103n0:51_14: pavattamānā paññā “paṭisandhiyaṁ paññā”ti vuttā taṁmūlakattā, na paṭisandhikkhaṇe pavattā eva.
anya-e0103n0:52_0: Cinteti ārammaṇaṁ upanijjhāyatīti cittaṁ, samādhi. So hi sātisayaṁ upanijjhānakicco.
anya-e0103n0:52_1: Na hi vitakkādayo vinā samādhinā tamatthaṁ sādhenti, samādhi pana tehi vināpi sādhetīti.
anya-e0103n0:52_2: Paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena paccayehi citaṁ, tathā santānaṁ cinotītipi cittaṁ, samādhi.
anya-e0103n0:52_3: Paṭhamajjhānādivasena cittavicittatāya, iddhividhādicittakaraṇena ca samādhi cittanti
anya-e0103n0:52_4: vināpi paropadesenassa cittapariyāyo labbhateva. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana citta-saddo viññāṇe
anya-e0103n0:52_5: niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṁ “cittasīsena hettha samādhi niddiṭṭho”ti. Yathāsabhāvaṁ pakārehi
anya-e0103n0:52_6: jānātīti paññā. Sā yadipi kusalādibhedato bahuvidhā. “Bhāvaya”nti pana vacanato bhāvetabbā
anya-e0103n0:52_7: idhādhippetāti taṁ dassetuṁ “vipassana”nti vuttaṁ. “Bhāvaya”nti ca idaṁ paccekaṁ
anya-e0103n0:52_8: yojetabbaṁ “cittañca bhāvayaṁ, paññañca bhāvaya”nti. Tayidaṁ dvayaṁ kiṁ lokiyaṁ,
anya-e0103n0:52_9: udāhu lokuttaranti? Lokuttaranti daṭṭhabbaṁ ukkaṭṭhaniddesato. Taṁ hi bhāvayamāno
anya-e0103n0:52_10: ariyamaggakkhaṇe taṇhājaṭaṁ samucchedavasena vijaṭetīti vuccati, na lokiyaṁ. Nānantariyabhāvena
anya-e0103n0:52_11: panettha lokiyāpi gahitāva honti lokiyasamathavipassanāya vinā tadabhāvato. Samathayānikassa
anya-e0103n0:52_12: hi upacārappanāppabhedaṁ samādhiṁ itarassa khaṇikasamādhiṁ, ubhayesampi vimokkhamukhattayaṁ
anya-e0103n0:52_13: vinā na kadācipi lokuttarādhigamo sambhavati. Tenāha “samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno”ti.
anya-e0103n0:52_14: Tattha yadā lokiyā samathavipassanā adhippetā, tadā “bhāvaya”nti idaṁ bhāvanākiriyāya
anya-e0103n0:52_15: hetubhāvakathanaṁ, bhāvanāhetūti attho. Taṁbhāvanāhetukā hi vijaṭanakiriyāti. Yadā
anya-e0103n0:52_16: pana lokuttarā adhippetā, tadā kevalaṁ vattamānabhāvaniddeso. Tadubhayabhāvanāsamakālameva
anya-e0103n0:53_0: “Ātāpī nipako”ti idaṁ yathāvuttabhāvanāya upakārakadhammakittanaṁ. Kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjantassa
anya-e0103n0:53_1: hi vīriyaṁ sati sampajaññanti ime tayo dhammā bahūpakārā. Vīriyūpatthaddhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:53_2: satisampajaññānupālitaṁ na paripatati, upari ca visesaṁ āvahati. Patiṭṭhāsiddhiyā
anya-e0103n0:53_3: cettha saddhāsiddhi, saddhūpanissayattā sīlassa, vīriyādisiddhiyā ca. Na hi saddheyyavatthuṁ
anya-e0103n0:53_4: asaddahantassa yathāvuttavīriyādayo sambhavanti, tathā samādhipi. Yathā hi hetubhāvato
anya-e0103n0:53_5: vīriyādīhi saddhāsiddhi, evaṁ phalabhāvato tehi samādhisiddhi. Vīriyādīsu hi sampajjamānesu
anya-e0103n0:53_6: samādhi sampannova hoti asamāhitassa tadabhāvato. Kathaṁ panettha satisiddhi? Nipakaggahaṇato.
anya-e0103n0:53_7: Tikkhavisadabhāvappattā hi sati “nepakka”nti vuccati. Yathāha “paramena satinepakkena
anya-e0103n0:53_8: samannāgato”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “nepakkaṁ paññā”ti ayamattho dassito. Taggahaṇeneva
anya-e0103n0:53_9: satipi gahitāva hoti. Na hi sativirahitā paññā atthīti. Apare pana “sapañño”ti imināva
anya-e0103n0:53_10: pārihārikapaññāpi gayhatīti “nipako”ti padassa “sato”ti atthaṁ vadanti. Yadipi kilesānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:53_11: pahānaṁ ātāpanaṁ, taṁ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva. Ātappasaddo viya pana ātāpasaddo
anya-e0103n0:53_12: vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti āha “ātāpīti vīriyavā”ti. Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:53_13: abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṁ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā
anya-e0103n0:53_14: vuccati, na aññe dhammā. Ātāpīti cāyamīkāro pasaṁsāya, atisayassa vā dīpako. Vīriyavāti
anya-e0103n0:53_15: vā-saddopi tadattho eva daṭṭhabbo. Tena sammappadhānasamaṅgitā vuttā hoti. Tenāha
anya-e0103n0:53_17: ādito vīriyārambhoti katvā, paritāpanaggahaṇena nikkamaparakkamadhātuyo sabbaso paṭipakkhato
anya-e0103n0:53_18: nikkhantataṁ, uparūpari visesappattiñca upādāya. Nipayati visoseti paṭipakkhaṁ, tato
anya-e0103n0:53_19: vā attānaṁ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako, sampajāno. Kammaṭṭhānassa pariharaṇe niyuttāti pārihārikā.
anya-e0103n0:54_0: Abhikkamādīni sabbakiccāni sātthakasampajaññādivasena paricchijja netīti sabbakiccapariṇāyikā.
anya-e0103n0:54_1: Kammaṭṭhānassa vā uggaho paripucchā bhāvanārambho manasikāravidhi, tattha ca sakkaccakāritā
anya-e0103n0:54_2: sātaccakāritā sappāyakāritā nimittakusalatā pahitattatā antarāasaṅkoco indriyasamattapaṭipādanā
anya-e0103n0:54_3: vīriyasamatāpādanaṁ vīriyasamatāyojananti evamādīnaṁ sabbesaṁ kiccānaṁ pariṇāyikā
anya-e0103n0:54_4: sabbakiccapariṇāyikā. Bhayaṁ ikkhatīti bhikkhūti sādhāraṇato bhikkhulakkhaṇakathanena
anya-e0103n0:54_5: paṭipattiyāva bhikkhubhāvo, na bhikkhakabhinnapaṭadharādibhāvenāti dasseti. Evaṁ
anya-e0103n0:54_6: hi katakiccānaṁ sāmaṇerādīnaṁ, paṭipannānañca apabbajitānampi saṅgaho kato hoti.
anya-e0103n0:54_7: Idha pana paṭipajjanakavasena attho veditabbo. Bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti vā
anya-e0103n0:54_8: bhikkhu. So imaṁ vijaṭayeti yo naro sappañño sīle patiṭṭhāya ātāpī nipako cittaṁ
anya-e0103n0:54_9: paññañca bhāvayanti vutto, so bhikkhu imaṁ taṇhājaṭaṁ vijaṭayeti sambandho. Idāni
anya-e0103n0:54_10: tampi vijaṭanaṁ veḷugumbavijaṭanena upametvā dassetuṁ gāthāya yathāvutte sīlādidhamme
anya-e0103n0:54_11: “iminā ca sīlenā”tiādinā paccāmasati. Tattha yasmā yogāvacarasantānagatā nānākkhaṇikā
anya-e0103n0:54_12: missakā sīlādidhammā gāthāya gahitā, tasmā te ekaccaṁ gaṇhanto “chahi dhammehi samannāgato”ti
anya-e0103n0:54_13: āha. Na hi te cha dhammā ekasmiṁ santāne ekasmiṁ khaṇe labbhanti. Yasmā ca puggalādhiṭṭhānena
anya-e0103n0:54_14: gāthā bhāsitā, tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānameva upamaṁ dassento “seyyathāpi nāma puriso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:54_15: Tattha sunisitanti suṭṭhu nisitaṁ, ativiya tikhiṇanti attho. Satthassa nisānasilāyaṁ
anya-e0103n0:54_16: nisitatarabhāvakaraṇaṁ, bāhubalena cassa ukkhipananti ubhayampetaṁ atthāpannaṁ katvā
anya-e0103n0:54_17: upamā vuttāti tadubhayaṁ upameyye dassento “samādhisilāyaṁ sunisitaṁ…pe… paññāhatthena
anya-e0103n0:54_18: ukkhipitvā”ti āha. Samādhiguṇena hi paññāya tikkhabhāvo. Tenāha bhagavā “samāhito
anya-e0103n0:54_19: yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti. Vīriyañcassā upatthambhakaṁ paggaṇhanato. Vijaṭeyyāti vijaṭetuṁ
anya-e0103n0:54_20: sakkuṇeyya. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hi vattamānāya yogāvacaro taṇhājaṭaṁ vijaṭetuṁ
anya-e0103n0:54_21: samattho nāma. Vijaṭanaṁ cettha samucchedavasena pahānanti āha “sañchindeyya sampadāleyyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:54_22: Dakkhiṇaṁ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo, aggo ca so dakkhiṇeyyo cāti aggadakkhiṇeyyo, aggā
anya-e0103n0:54_23: vā dakkhiṇā aggadakkhiṇā, taṁ arahatīti aggadakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0103n0:55_0: 5.Tatrāti tassaṁ gāthāyaṁ. Ayanti “naro”ti ca “bhikkhū”ti ca vutto yogāvacaro. Puna
anya-e0103n0:55_1: tatrāti tassaṁ paññāyaṁ. Assāti bhikkhuno. Kattari cetaṁ sāmivacanaṁ, anenāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:55_2: Karaṇīyaṁ natthi visesādhānassa tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya abhāvato. Tenāha “purimakammānubhāveneva
anya-e0103n0:55_3: hissa sā siddhā”ti. Tenāti yoginā. Bhāvanāyaṁ satatapavattitavīriyatāya sātaccakārinā.
anya-e0103n0:55_4: Paññāvasenāti yathāvuttanepakkasaṅkhātapaññāvasena. Yaṁ kiñci kattabbaṁ, tassa sabbassa
anya-e0103n0:55_5: sampajānavaseneva karaṇasīlo, tattha vā sampajānakāro etassa atthi, sampajānassa
anya-e0103n0:55_6: vā asammohassa kārako uppādakoti sampajānakārī, tena sampajānakārinā. Atrāti assaṁ
anya-e0103n0:55_7: gāthāyaṁ. Sīlādisampādane vīriyassa tesaṁ aṅgabhāvato taṁ visuṁ aggahetvā “sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:56_0: “Visuddhimaggaṁ dassetī”ti avibhāgato desanāya piṇḍatthaṁ vatvā puna taṁ vibhāgato
anya-e0103n0:56_1: dassetuṁ “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha ettāvatāti ettakāya desanāya. Sikkhāti sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n0:56_2: sikkhā. Sikkhanaṁ cettha āsevanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Sīlādidhammehi saṁvaraṇādivasena āsevanto
anya-e0103n0:56_3: te sikkhatīti vuccati. Sāsananti paṭipattisāsanaṁ. Upanissayo balavakāraṇaṁ. Vajjanaṁ
anya-e0103n0:56_4: anupagamanaṁ. Sevanā bhāvanā. Paṭipakkhoti pahāyakapaṭipakkho. Yadipi gāthāyaṁ “sīle”ti
anya-e0103n0:56_5: sāmaññato vuttaṁ, na “adhisīle”ti. Taṁ pana taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanassa patiṭṭhābhūtaṁ adhippetanti
anya-e0103n0:56_6: āha “sīlena adhisīlasikkhā pakāsitā”ti. Bhavagāmi hi sīlaṁ sīlameva, vibhavagāmi
anya-e0103n0:56_7: sīlaṁ adhisīlasikkhā. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti. Esa nayo sesasikkhāsupi.
anya-e0103n0:57_0: Sīlenāti adhisīlasikkhābhūtena sīlena. Taṁ hi anaññasādhāraṇatāya sāsanassa ādikalyāṇataṁ
anya-e0103n0:57_1: pakāseti, na yamaniyamādimattaṁ. Tena vuttaṁ “sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ, sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti
anya-e0103n0:57_2: ca. Kusalānanti maggakusalānaṁ. Kusalānanti vā anavajjānaṁ. Tena ariyaphaladhammānampi
anya-e0103n0:57_3: saṅgaho siddho hoti. Sabbapāpassa akaraṇanti sabbassāpi sāvajjassa akiriyā anajjhāpajjanaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:57_4: Etena cārittavārittabhedassa sabbassa sīlassa gahaṇaṁ kataṁ hoti. Kattabbākaraṇampi
anya-e0103n0:57_5: hi sāvajjamevāti. Ādivacanatoti gāthāyaṁ vuttasamādhipaññānaṁ ādimhi vacanato. Ādibhāvo
anya-e0103n0:57_6: cassa tammūlakattā uttarimanussadhammānaṁ. Ādīnaṁ vā vacanaṁ ādivacanaṁ. Ādisaddena
anya-e0103n0:57_7: cettha “sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā”ti evamādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:57_9: etena na kevalaṁ sīlassa kalyāṇatāva vibhāvitā, atha kho ādibhāvopīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:57_10: Tathā hissa sutte avippaṭisārādīnaṁ vimuttiñāṇapariyosānānaṁ paramparapaccayatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:57_11: Samādhināti adhicittasikkhābhūtena samādhinā. Sakalaṁ sāsanaṁ saṅgahetvā pavattāya
anya-e0103n0:57_12: gāthāya ādipadena ādimhi paṭipajjitabbassa sīlassa, tatiyapadena pariyosāne paṭipajjitabbāya
anya-e0103n0:57_13: paññāya gahitattā majjhe paṭipajjitabbo samādhi pārisesato dutiyapadena gayhatīti
anya-e0103n0:57_14: “kusalassa upasampadātiādivacanato hi samādhi sāsanassa majjhe”ti vuttaṁ, na kusalasaddassa
anya-e0103n0:57_16: samādhissa iddhividhādiguṇāvahattaṁ, aggamaggapaññāya adhigatāya yadatthaṁ pabbajati,
anya-e0103n0:57_17: taṁ pariyositanti paññā sāsanassapariyosānaṁ. Tenāha bhagavā “sikkhānisaṁsamidaṁ,
anya-e0103n0:57_18: bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṁ vussati saddhādhipateyyaṁ paññuttaraṁ vimuttisāra”nti. Sakaṁ
anya-e0103n0:57_19: cittaṁ sacittaṁ, sacittassa sabbaso kilesānaṁ samucchindanena visodhanaṁ sacittapariyodāpanaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:57_20: Evaṁ pana paññākicce matthakappatte uttari karaṇīyābhāvato sāsanassa paññuttaratā
anya-e0103n0:57_21: veditabbā. Tādibhāvāvahanatoti yādiso iṭṭhesu, lābhādīsu ca anunayābhāvato, tādiso
anya-e0103n0:57_22: aniṭṭhesu, alābhādīsu ca paṭighābhāvato. Tato eva vā yādiso anāpāthagatesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu,
anya-e0103n0:57_23: tādiso āpāthagatesupīti tādī. Tassa bhāvo tādibhāvo, tassa āvahanato. Vātenāti vātahetu.
anya-e0103n0:57_24: Na samīratīti na calati. Na samiñjantīti na phandanti, kuto calananti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:58_0: Tathāti yathā sīlādayo adhisīlasikkhādīnaṁ pakāsakā, tathā tevijjatādīnaṁ upanissayassāti
anya-e0103n0:58_1: tesaṁ pakāsanākārūpasaṁhārattho tathā-saddo. Yasmā sīlaṁ visujjhamānaṁ satisampajaññabalena,
anya-e0103n0:58_2: kammassakatañāṇabalena ca saṁkilesamalato visujjhati pāripūriñca gacchati, tasmā
anya-e0103n0:58_3: sīlasampadā sijjhamānā upanissayasampattibhāvena satibalaṁ, ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti
anya-e0103n0:58_4: tassā vijjattayūpanissayatā veditabbā sabhāgahetusampādanato. Satinepakkena hi pubbenivāsavijjāsiddhi,
anya-e0103n0:58_7: tatiyavijjāsiddhi. Puretaraṁ siddhānaṁ samādhipaññānaṁ pāripūriṁ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā
anya-e0103n0:58_8: sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavehi dīpetabbā. Samādhipaññā viya abhiññāpaṭisambhidānaṁ sīlaṁ
anya-e0103n0:58_9: na sabhāgahetūti katvā vuttaṁ “na tato para”nti. “Samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti
anya-e0103n0:58_10: vacanato samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo. Paññā viya paṭisambhidānaṁ samādhi
anya-e0103n0:58_11: na sabhāgahetūti vuttaṁ “na tato para”nti. “Yogā ve jāyate bhūrī”ti vacanato pubbayogena,
anya-e0103n0:58_14: visesassa abhāvato, tassā ca paṭisambhidāpabhedassa ekantikakāraṇato heṭṭhā viya
anya-e0103n0:58_15: “na tato para”nti avatvā “na aññena kāraṇenā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:59_0: Ettha ca “sīlasampattiñhi nissāyā”ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā anavasesā
anya-e0103n0:59_1: cha abhiññā na ijjhanti, tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā atthīti.
anya-e0103n0:59_2: Satipi vijjānaṁ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampattisamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā.
anya-e0103n0:59_3: Yathā hi paññāsampattisamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva
anya-e0103n0:59_4: ijjhanti, maggakkhaṇe eva tāsaṁ paṭilabhitabbato, evaṁ sīlasampattisamudāgatā tisso
anya-e0103n0:59_5: vijjā samādhisampattisamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhantīti
anya-e0103n0:59_6: maggādhigameneva tāsaṁ adhigamo veditabbo. Paccekabuddhānaṁ, sammāsambuddhānañca
anya-e0103n0:59_8: Vinayasuttābhidhammesu sammāpaṭipattiyā tevijjatādīnaṁ upanissayatāpi yathāvuttavidhinā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:60_0: Sampannasīlassa kāmasevanābhāvato sīlena paṭhamantavivajjanaṁ vuttaṁ. Yebhuyyena
anya-e0103n0:60_1: hi sattā kāmahetu pāṇātipātādivasenāpi asuddhapayogā honti. Jhānasukhalābhino kāyakilamathassa
anya-e0103n0:60_2: sambhavo eva natthīti samādhinā dutiyantavivajjanaṁ vuttaṁ jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyattā.
anya-e0103n0:60_3: Paññāyāti maggapaññāya. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi ekaṁsato ariyamaggova majjhimā paṭipatti
anya-e0103n0:60_4: nāma. Evaṁ santepi lokiyapaññāvasenapi antadvayavivajjanaṁ vibhāvetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:61_0: Sīlaṁ taṁsamaṅgino kāmasugatīsuyeva nibbattāpanato catūhi apāyehi vimuttiyā kāraṇanti
anya-e0103n0:61_1: āha “sīlena apāyasamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hotī”ti. Na hi pāṇātipātādipaṭivirati
anya-e0103n0:61_2: duggatiparikilesaṁ āvahati. Samādhi taṁsamaṅgino mahaggatabhūmiyaṁyeva nibbattāpanena
anya-e0103n0:61_4: hotī”ti. Na hi kāmāvacarakammassa anubalappadāyīnaṁ kāmacchandādīnaṁ vikkhambhakaṁ
anya-e0103n0:61_5: jhānaṁ kāmadhātuparikilesāvahaṁ hoti. Na cettha upacārajjhānaṁ nidassetabbaṁ, appanāsamādhissa
anya-e0103n0:61_6: adhippetattā. Nāpi “sīleneva atikkamitabbassa apāyabhavassa samādhinā atikkamitabbatā”ti
anya-e0103n0:61_7: vacanokāso. Sugatibhavampi atikkamantassa duggatisamatikkamane kā kathāti. Sabbabhavasamatikkamanupāyoti
anya-e0103n0:61_8: kāmabhavādīnaṁ navannampi bhavānaṁ samatikkamanupāyo sīlasamādhīhi atikkantāpi bhavā
anya-e0103n0:61_9: anatikkantā eva, kāraṇassa apahīnattā. Paññāya panassa suppahīnattā te samatikkantā eva.
anya-e0103n0:62_0: Tadaṅgappahānavasenāti dīpālokeneva tamassa puññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena
anya-e0103n0:62_1: tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānavasena. Samādhinā vikkhambhanappahānavasenāti upacārappanābhedena
anya-e0103n0:62_2: samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahāreneva jalatale sevālassa tesaṁ tesaṁ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:62_3: pahānavasena. Paññāyāti ariyamaggapaññāya. Samucchedappahānavasenāti catunnaṁ ariyamaggānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:62_4: bhāvitattā taṁtaṁmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāyā”tiādinā vuttassa
anya-e0103n0:63_0: Kilesānaṁ vītikkamapaṭipakkhoti saṁkilesadhammānaṁ, kammakilesānaṁ vā yo kāyavacīdvāresu
anya-e0103n0:63_1: vītikkamo ajjhācāro, tassa paṭipakkho sīlena pakāsito hoti, avītikkamasabhāvattā
anya-e0103n0:63_2: sīlassa. Okāsādānavasena kilesānaṁ citte kusalappavattiṁ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṁ pariyuṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:63_3: Taṁ samādhi vikkhambhetīti āha “samādhinā pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti,
anya-e0103n0:63_4: samādhissa pariyuṭṭhānappahāyakattā. Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanato kāraṇalābhe
anya-e0103n0:63_5: uppattirahā anusayā, te pana anurūpaṁ kāraṇaṁ laddhā uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo
anya-e0103n0:63_6: satta kilesā veditabbā. Te ariyamaggapaññāya sabbaso pahīyantīti āha “paññāya anusayapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:64_0: Kāyaduccaritādi duṭṭhu caritaṁ, kilesehi vā dūsitaṁ caritanti duccaritaṁ, tameva
anya-e0103n0:64_1: yattha uppannaṁ, taṁ santānaṁ saṁkileseti vibādhati, upatāpeti cāti saṁkileso, tassa
anya-e0103n0:64_2: visodhanaṁ sīlena tadaṅgavasena pahānaṁ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa. Taṇhāsaṁkilesassa
anya-e0103n0:64_3: visodhanaṁ vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṁ pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkhattā samādhissa, taṇhāya
anya-e0103n0:64_4: cassa ujuvipaccanikabhāvato. Diṭṭhisaṁkilesassa visodhanaṁ samucchedavasena pahānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:64_5: anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāya, diṭṭhigatānañca ayāthāvagāhīnaṁ yāthāvagāhiniyā paññāya
anya-e0103n0:65_0: Kāraṇanti upanissayapaccayo. Sīlesu paripūrakārīti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtattā
anya-e0103n0:65_2: khuddānukhuddakānaṁ āpajjane sahasāva tehi vuṭṭhānena sīlesu yaṁ kattabbaṁ, taṁ paripūraṁ
anya-e0103n0:65_3: samatthaṁ karotīti sīlesu paripūrakārī. Tathā sakadāgāmīti “sīlesu paripūrakārī”ti
anya-e0103n0:65_4: etaṁ upasaṁharati tathā-saddena. Ete hi dve ariyā samādhipāripanthikānaṁ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ
anya-e0103n0:65_5: paññāpāripanthikassa saccapaṭicchādakamohassa sabbaso asamūhatattā samādhiṁ, paññañca
anya-e0103n0:65_6: bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu yaṁ kattabbaṁ, taṁ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti
anya-e0103n0:65_7: samādhismiṁ, paññāya ca mattaso kārino “sīlesu paripūrakārino”icceva vuccanti. Anāgāmī
anya-e0103n0:65_8: pana kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ samucchinnattā samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī. Arahā sabbaso sammohassa
anya-e0103n0:67_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ mattaso kārī, paññāya
anya-e0103n0:67_1: mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
anya-e0103n0:67_2: Taṁ kissa hetu? Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā. Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni
anya-e0103n0:67_3: ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni, tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti ṭhitasīlo ca,
anya-e0103n0:67_4: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti
anya-e0103n0:67_5: avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu…pe…
anya-e0103n0:67_6: so tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti. Sakideva
anya-e0103n0:67_7: imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī
anya-e0103n0:67_8: hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
anya-e0103n0:67_9: So pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ…pe… anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā. Idha pana, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n0:67_10: bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī.
anya-e0103n0:67_11: So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So āsavānaṁ khayā…pe…
anya-e0103n0:68_0: “Katha”nti pucchitvā sikkhādike vibhajitvā vuttamevatthaṁ nigametuṁ “eva”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n0:68_1: Tattha aññe cāti tayo vivekā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni, tīṇi indriyānīti
anya-e0103n0:68_2: evamādayo, sikkhattikādīhi aññe ca guṇattikā. Evarūpāti yādisakā sikkhattikādayo
anya-e0103n0:69_0: Ettha hi vivaṭṭasannissitassa sīlassa idhādhippetattā sīlena kāyaviveko pakāsito
anya-e0103n0:69_1: hoti, samādhinā cittaviveko, paññāya upadhiviveko. Tathā sīlena adoso kusalamūlaṁ
anya-e0103n0:69_2: pakāsitaṁ hoti, titikkhappadhānatāya, aparūpaghātasabhāvatāya ca sīlassa. Samādhinā
anya-e0103n0:69_3: alobho kusalamūlaṁ, lobhapaṭipakkhato, alobhapadhānatāya ca samādhissa. Paññāya pana
anya-e0103n0:69_4: amohoyeva. Sīlena ca animittavimokkhamukhaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti. Adosappadhānaṁ hi sīlasampadaṁ
anya-e0103n0:69_5: nissāya dose ādīnavadassino aniccānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, aniccānupassanā ca
anya-e0103n0:69_7: Alobhappadhānaṁ hi kāmanissaraṇaṁ samādhisampadaṁ nissāya kāmesu ādīnavadassino dukkhānupassanā
anya-e0103n0:69_8: sukheneva ijjhati, dukkhānupassanā ca appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṁ. Paññāsampadaṁ nissāya
anya-e0103n0:69_9: anattānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, anattānupassanā ca suññatavimokkhamukhaṁ. Tathā
anya-e0103n0:69_10: sīlena anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti. Taṁ hi sīlesu paripūrakārino aṭṭhamakassa
anya-e0103n0:69_11: indriyaṁ. Samādhinā aññindriyaṁ. Taṁ hi ukkaṁsagataṁ samādhismiṁ paripūrakārino anāgāmino,
anya-e0103n0:69_12: aggamaggaṭṭhassa ca indriyaṁ. Paññāya aññātāvindriyaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti. Taduppattiyā
anya-e0103n0:69_13: hi arahā paññāya paripūrakārīti. Iminā nayena aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā sīlādīhi pakāsetabbā.
